title: So I elected an autocrat
description:
Noel King traveled to Hungary to talk to people who voted for Viktor Orb치n, people being persecuted by his government, and an American just along for the ride.
This episode was produced by Miles Bryan, edited by Jolie Myers and Matt Collette, fact-checked by Laura Bullard, engineered by Efim Shapiro, and hosted by Noel King.
Transcript at vox.com/todayexplained
